title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history & prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-alike VS-Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, model management, reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Curated collection of docker-compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, QDrant, etc.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds LLM assistance (summarize, rewrite, translate) via local Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible builds & deployments of Ollama and model bundles.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that delegates service tasks to Ollama models for AI-driven workflows.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent facade and artisan commands to interact with Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio & serde.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to your server using Ollama.

title: ollama-unity
summary: Unity plugin to run Ollama models in-game for NPC dialogue, quest generation, and AI storytelling.
